# abs
abs(-1)     | 1
abs(-1.2)   | 1.2
abs(1)      | 1
abs(1.2)    | 1.2

# sin
sin(1)      | 0.84
sin(1 rad)  | 0.84
sin(90 deg) | 1

# ceil
ceil(2)     | 2
ceil(2.3)   | 3
ceil(2.9)   | 3
ceil(-2)    | -2
ceil(-2.3)  | -2
ceil(-2.6)  | -2
ceil(-0.1)  | 0
ceil(0.1)   | 1

# floor
floor(2)     | 2
floor(2.3)   | 2
floor(2.9)   | 2
floor(-2)    | -2
floor(-2.3)  | -3
floor(-2.6)  | -3
floor(-0.1)  | -1
floor(0.1)   | 0

# trunc
trunc(2)     | 2
trunc(2.3)   | 2
trunc(2.9)   | 2
trunc(-2)    | -2
trunc(-2.3)  | -2
trunc(-2.6)  | -2
trunc(-0.1)  | 0
trunc(0.1)   | 0

# round
|round(0)             | 0
|round(1)             | 1
|round(-1)            | -1
|round(1.3)           | 1
|round(1.5)           | 2
|round(-1.3)          | -1
|round(-1.5)          | -2
|round(0, 1)          | 0
|round(1/3, 1)        | 0.3
|round(0.55, 1)       | 0.6
|round(-0.55, 1)      | 0.6
|round(1234.456, -1)  | 1230
|round(1234.456, 1.2) | !integer
|round(1, 10^100)     | !bound
